features: 🎁【Pre-Education Toys for Boys Age 1-3】On the magnetic doodle baord, children's visual-, hands-on ability, color recognition ability and creativity improves through freely drawing and playing games. More than only creating art, use the magnetic drawing board to learn letters,words and numbers.

🎁【Sturdy Drawing Table or Doodle Board】: The screw-on design and high-quality legs make the drawing board have a strong bearing capacity, up to 120 lbs. No need to worry about shaking or breaking. The 4 legs of the table are detachable and can be changed in 3 ways. Let babies draw more freely and comfortably.

🎁【In Order and Easy to Use】Instead of spending a lot of paper, crayons, and pencils, a magnetic drawing board is a clean and eco-friendly way to satisfy your child's drawing. The eraser knob glides easily and smoothly for kids. Erases in a second for a clean drawing area for new drawings.

🎁【Safety and Environmt Friendly】The magnetic drawing board is made of high-quality and durable ABS. It is non-toxic, safe, BPA free, and has no choking small parts. The doodle board has Full-Sealed on the back and the corners are rounded to avoid scratching children. The paintbrush is in the middle, connected the board with a rope so as not to be swallowed or lost by mistake. It is also friendly to left-handed children.

🎁【Gifts for 1 2 3 Years Boys】: Fun kids toys. The writing pad for toddlers is a attractive gift for kids to release their creativity. Not only a great holiday gift, birthday gift, Christmas gift, holiday gift, visit gift for little girls and boys, but also a relatively cheap way to allow your little ones to enjoy endless art and education time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Kikidex Upgraded Colorful Magnetic Drawing Board Kikidex magnetic drawing board is an art enlightening toy for children. It is not only an important way for kids to explore the world but also to express their feelings. Great autism sensory toys for autistic children. A colorful doodle board helps exercise kids' color cognition ability, hand fine motor movement skills, hand-eye coordination, and innovation creation ability development. Take your little child to a colorful imaginative world through their creative writing and drawing with our sketch board. An awesome learning & education toy for toddlers 1-3 girls boys! Enjoy happy family time!

What Will Kikidex Magnetic Doodle Board Erasable Pad Bring to You and Your Kids? No Easy Lost Pen - The magnetic pen is tightly attached to the kids doodle board with a string. Keep Child Occupied - Help parents get rid of endless mess from lively kids, the interesting magnetic doodle writing pad can keep little hands busy. Eye Care - Protect todders' eyes from radiation and the light harm of electronic screen. No Mess, Solve Mother's Troubles - Prevent inhalation of dirty crayons, chalk powder, ink, and pigment and kid won't draw on walls & faces. No stain on your kid's clothes and face. Leave your house clean( floor, wall or furnitures) . A great educational and learning toy for 1-3 years old kids.

Larger Drawing Board 8.7inch Fully Usable Large Screen Size -compared to 8.3inch small screen size with the unpaintable edge in the market- Let your child draw what they want on the doodle board with no blind angle. Soft Silicone Ergonomical Handle Smartly designed with an soft easy-to-grab handle. Lightweight, portable size and comfortable handle make it easy to carry and go for kids. Great travel toys for toddlers 1-3. kids can carry and play everywhere they go. Safe & Durable Made of high-quality ABS material, which is BPA-free, non-toxic and durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for a 2 year old.
reviews.reviewText: This product is sturdy and cute. I would buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Little Drawing Table
reviews.reviewText: Nice little drawing table. Easy to install the legs. I really like the four quadrants being different colors, it adds just that little bit extra. One complaint is that the string is a little short but I can see that to keep the kiddos safe. They likely wouldn't even notice. I do like the size of the pen, it is easier to hold than others that we have tried. There is even a handle it you just want to use the table as a tablet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Bought for my youngest daughter. Not as used as I’d had hoped for but overall a great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fun and Mess-Free
reviews.reviewText: My 1 year old loves this. It is great to get him to start coloring, without the mess. The magnetic colors are nice. I had to cut the pen from the string as it was not long enough for my liking. Which both a long string and the pen removed from the string can be a hazard, so we watch him closely with this. He does enjoy writing on it and flipping it over and hitting it as well. The erase function on the board is very hard to use, so i expect your little one would need your assistance on this as sometimes I have to use both hands (one to hold the board and one to slide the erase slider) in order to clear it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Need a portable toy to occupy your toddler?
reviews.reviewText: If you have a toddler who has to have something to do when they are on the go, this is the perfect gift for them. The legs are easy to remove, so the "tablet" can be take with you on the go. It's also very light, so any toddler can carry it around with them. It is plastic, so I am not sure how durable it is going to be in the long run, but for now it is holding up good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's ok, not great. Can do with minor changes
reviews.reviewText: I got this a couple of months ago and though my son enjoys the drawing, I do have a few comments.The first one is the pen extension string is too short. It's impossible to draw on the bottom when connected to the string. I ended up cutting the string off which is a shame, because I find myself looking for the pen every few days.Second thing is the colors aren't as bright as shown and also could do a better job on the lines and how well the pen reacts to the screen. I doubt I would buy this again but for the time being it's ok

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly as described love it!
reviews.reviewText: Daughter loves it! Her favorite color is blue and it draws colorful! It withstands weight thankfully lol! Though I don't let them purposely stand on it but I thank God it does hold up to them and don't break when I can't catch them doing it! Very pleased!
Satisfaite de mon achat, bon produit de bonne qualité.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this easy for my 1 year old granddaughter to use and fast service too

reviews.reviewTitle: Schöner Reisebegleiter fürs Auto oder unterwegs
reviews.reviewText: Der Maltisch bereitet kleinen Kindern viel Freude, der Stift ist groß genug sodass auch Kleinkinder leicht mit diesem Zeichnen können. Schön ist, dass die gemalten Striche einen Farbverlauf haben und die Kreativität der Kinder weiter anregen. Der Tisch kann sowohl mit den Beinen im Zimmer, als auch als "Tablet" unterwegs, z.B. im Autositz genutzt werden. Auch Stürze aus Kinderhänden oder robusteres Drücken hat der Maltisch sehr gut weggesteckt, jedoch sind die Beine etwas wackelig. Alles in einem ist der Tisch aber absolut zu empfehlen.

ce qu’il y a de bien avec ce style de tablette, c’est que le crayon est fourni et attaché, il ne peut pas être perdu, , ça prend magnétique permet de faire des dessins sur la tablette. Ils ressortent en couleur c’est vraiment chouette car vous avez 4 couleurs, le jaune, le bleu, le vert ou le rouge sur la tablette.Mais surtout la grande qualité quand même il faut le souligner c’est que la tablette déjà peut être emmenée partout mais surtout cela évite le gâchis de feuilles, car combien de dessins nous avons dans nos placards dans nos tiroirs de nos enfants quand ils étaient petits des gribouillis, certes mignon, mais il faut penser à la planète est recyclé donc c’est un bon moyen de ne pas utiliser des Feuilles à tout-va.

reviews.reviewTitle: ✍ Lavagnette magnetiche: un gioco utile per stimolare i vostri figli e un’ottima idea regalo 😍
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Ho sempre apprezzato le lavagnette magnetiche per bambini, in quanto, oltre ad essere un gioco divertente, le trovo utili per stimolare la creatività e favorire le capacità di coordinazione sensoriale. Infatti, disegnare e colorare sono due delle principali e più tangibili forme di espressione del bambino che in questo modo impara a migliorare dagli errori, cancellando e ricominciando a scarabocchiare.Proprio per questa serie di motivi ho voluto ordinare questa lavagnetta magnetica della Kikidex.Arriva in una scatola di cartone colorata e illustrata, sulla quale frontalmente è raffigurato il prodotto contenuto all’interno, mentre sul retro spiccano il paese di fabbricazione (Cina) e le varie certificazioni possedute, tra cui quella CE che ne sottolinea la conformità agli standard europei.All’interno, sigillata in una busta trasparente in plastica, troviamo: • la lavagnetta magnetica della Kikidex di colore celeste; • 4 piedi, di colore arancione, da avvitare alla base facendola diventare un tavolino da disegno; • un libretto delle istruzioni multilingue (italiano incluso); • una guida al montaggio illustrata; • un bigliettino di ringraziamento per l’acquisto, nel quale c’è scritto che utilizzando una lavagna magnetica al posto della carta, si risparmia l'uso di 9500 fogli di carta che equivalgono a circa 3 alberi.Questa tavola/lavagnetta misura ‎32 x 28 x 2,5 cm ed è realizzata in materiale plastico ABS atossico, privo di BPA ed ecologico, quindi adatto e sicuro per i bambini.Nella parte superiore è presente un alloggiamento in gomma dove riporre la penna (lunga 11 cm) che, per evitare di perderla, è fissata alla lavagna tramite un cordoncino, mentre nella parte inferiore troviamo un cursore che serve per cancellare i disegni.Sul retro, oltre ai 4 fori dove inserire i piedi, c’è una maniglia/cinghia di gomma molto comoda per portare la lavagna sempre con sé in modo più agevole.Il montaggio è semplicissimo: basta avvitare i 4 piedi nei 4 fori presenti alla base della lavagnetta fino a quando i segni di “stop”, presenti su entrambe le parti, coincidono.Questa tavola/lavagna si può utilizzare in 3 modi: poggiata direttamente su un tavolo senza piedi, montata con tutti e 4 i piedi a mo' di tavolino o solamente con due piedi, come una lavagna un po' inclinata rispetto al pavimento.Quando è montata con i 4 piedi funge anche da seggiolino con una capacità di carico fino a circa 50 kg, come dichiarato dalla casa. Non ho provato la veridicità di questo valore, che sinceramente mi sembra esagerato, ma credo che riesca a sostenere il peso di un bambino della fascia d’età a cui è rivolto il gioco (1-3 anni).Al mio nipotino è piaciuta molto e si diverte a fare disegni colorati premendo la punta della penna sulla lavagna magnetica ✍ che è divisa in 4 diverse zone di colorazione che sono, partendo dall’alto a sinistra, blu, rosso, verde, giallo, poi basta muovere il cursore per cancellare tutto e ripartire. 🤩Mettere a disposizione dei bambini un "foglio bianco infinito" che si colora per magia al passaggio della loro mano è uno stimolo continuo per sviluppare la creatività del piccolo, la sua capacità visiva e di coordinazione. Inoltre, la possibilità di cancellare gli errori, trasmette la consapevolezza di riuscire a migliorare imparando dagli stessi e favorisce l’esplorazione per ricercare, esplorando soluzioni alternative.Spero che questa recensione vi sia stata utile. 👋
